item.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Cluster 020 - Filerz49
item.description:
Feb 15, 09:21 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. --> End Time of the full backup : Mon 14th February 12:46 UTC

Feb 14, 12:58 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 79% of the backup is realized. We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 9, 13:26 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 33% of the backup is realized.
We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 8, 15:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : 23% of the backup is realized.
We will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 7, 09:24 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams finished the raid resynchronization and are currently doing the full backup (6% of the backup is realized).
The full backup will take 2 weeks, we will keep you updated on the progress.

Feb 3, 11:17 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions :The raid resynchronization will be finished in around 4 days then we move on to a full which will take place for 2 weeks.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Feb 1, 05:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are doing a reconstruction of the raid which may take several days.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Jan 31, 17:36 UTC
Update - UPDATE : The load is better. A backup is still ongoing, but there is a failing raid disk currently being repaired.
We apologize for any inconveniency caused.

Jan 31, 16:20 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/01/2022 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowdown on filerz49
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA
Scope of impact : All offers on cluster020
Ongoing actions : Checking for backup and identification of users overloading the filerz

item.title: [GRA1][Webhosting] - Data Migration
item.description:
Feb 11, 07:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 9, 05:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 3, 20:43 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :09/02/2022 05:00 UTC
End time :11/02/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Unavailability of the filerz for a period of 15 minutes during the migration
Service improvement : We discovered a reliability issue on some disks models we started to use recently on our filerz. We are doing data and service migration on Webhosting filerz with those model of disks in order to exclude them from our infrastructure. Each filerz will have a downtime of 15mn during the migration.
